geoip.py #!/usr/bin/python3
import geoip2.database, logging
geoipfile = "./GeoLite2-City.mmdb" read = geoip2.database.Reader(geoipfile)
def locations(ips: list[str]) -> list:
s = location() next(s) return [s.send(x) for x in ips]
def location() -> list: ip = "1.0.0.1" while True: try: response = read.city(ip) a = [ip, response.location.longitude, response.location.latitude] except Exception as e: logging.exception(e) a = [] ip = yield a
